text:
China dealt with Covid-19. 
Two times in about 7 months. 
They won over #Covid19 without vaccines.

Moral: 
Time is precious. 
Hope is the #vaccine. 
Togetherness is imp in this hard time.
#HealthInfrastructure improvement every 6 months is necessary.
#Humanity before #politics. https://t.co/QaEcxjUjkD
